dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-breathe
dependent_to.description:
This is an extension to reStructuredText and Sphinx to be able to read
and render the Doxygen xml output.

dependent_to.name: py-abipy
dependent_to.description: Python package to automate ABINIT calculations and analyze the results.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx

dependent_to.name: py-storm
dependent_to.description: Storm is an object-relational mapper (ORM) for Python

dependent_to.name: py-git-review
dependent_to.description: git-review is a tool that helps submitting git branches to gerrit

dependent_to.name: py-dxchange
dependent_to.description:
DXchange provides an interface with tomoPy and raw tomographic data
collected at different synchrotron facilities.

dependent_to.name: py-or-tools
dependent_to.description:
This project hosts operations research tools developed at Google and
made available as open source under the Apache 2.0 License.

dependent_to.name: py-cheroot
dependent_to.description: Highly-optimized, pure-python HTTP server

dependent_to.name: py-docker
dependent_to.description: A Python library for the Docker Engine API.

dependent_to.description: Read & write Java .properties files.

dependent_to.name: py-apscheduler
dependent_to.description: In-process task scheduler with Cron-like capabilities.

dependent_to.name: py-fire
dependent_to.description:
Python Fire is a library for automatically generating command line
interfaces (CLIs) with a single line of code.

dependent_to.name: hicops
dependent_to.description:
HiCOPS is a software framework for accelerating database peptide search
workflows on supercomputers. HiCOPS provided algorithm-independent
parallelizations and optimizations can be extended into new HPC database
search algorithms or scalably accelerate the existing ones.

dependent_to.name: py-cartopy
dependent_to.description: Cartopy - a cartographic python library with matplotlib support.

dependent_to.name: py-dm-tree
dependent_to.description:
tree is a library for working with nested data structures. In a way,
tree generalizes the builtin map() function which only supports flat
sequences, and allows to apply a function to each leaf preserving the
overall structure.

dependent_to.name: llvm-doe
dependent_to.description:
This package provides a collection of the experimental LLVM projects
done by the US DOE research and development teams.

dependent_to.name: py-pyopencl
dependent_to.description: Python wrapper for OpenCL.

dependent_to.name: py-petastorm
dependent_to.description:
Petastorm is a library enabling the use of Parquet storage from
Tensorflow, Pytorch, and other Python-based ML training frameworks.

dependent_to.name: py-biom-format
dependent_to.description:
The BIOM file format (canonically pronounced biome) is designed to be a
general-use format for representing biological sample by observation
contingency tables.

dependent_to.name: py-gcs-oauth2-boto-plugin
dependent_to.description:
Auth plugin allowing use the use of OAuth 2.0 credentials for Google
Cloud Storage in the Boto library.

dependent_to.name: py-pyfaidx
dependent_to.description: pyfaidx: efficient pythonic random access to fasta subsequences

dependent_to.name: py-wxmplot
dependent_to.description: wxPython plotting widgets using matplotlib.

dependent_to.name: py-retrying
dependent_to.description:
Retrying is an Apache 2.0 licensed general-purpose retrying library,
written in Python, to simplify the task of adding retry behavior to just
about anything.

dependent_to.name: py-vcrpy
dependent_to.description:
Automatically mock your HTTP interactions to simplify and speed up
testing.

dependent_to.name: py-google-pasta
dependent_to.description: pasta is an AST-based Python refactoring library.

dependent_to.name: py-jsonschema
dependent_to.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-bcrypt
dependent_to.description: Modern password hashing for your software and your servers

dependent_to.name: py-freezegun
dependent_to.description:
FreezeGun is a library that allows your Python tests to travel through
time by mocking the datetime module.

dependent_to.name: py-basemap
dependent_to.description:
The matplotlib basemap toolkit is a library for plotting 2D data on maps
in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-griddataformats
dependent_to.description:
The gridDataFormats package provides classes to unify reading and
writing n-dimensional datasets. One can read grid data from files, make
them available as a Grid object, and write out the data again.

dependent_to.name: py-click-repl
dependent_to.description: Subcommand REPL for click apps

dependent_to.name: py-performance
dependent_to.description:
The performance project is intended to be an authoritative source of
benchmarks for all Python implementations. The focus is on real-world
benchmarks, rather than synthetic benchmarks, using whole applications
when possible.

dependent_to.name: py-duecredit
dependent_to.description: Publications (and donations) tracer.

dependent_to.name: py-cvxpy
dependent_to.description: Convex optimization, for everyone.

dependent_to.name: py-hyperopt
dependent_to.description:
Hyperopt is a Python library for serial and parallel optimization over
awkward search spaces, which may include real-valued, discrete, and
conditional dimensions.

dependent_to.name: py-oslo-i18n
dependent_to.description:
The oslo.i18n library contain utilities for working with
internationalization (i18n) features, especially translation for text
strings in an application or library.

dependent_to.name: openmolcas
dependent_to.description:
OpenMolcas is a quantum chemistry software package. The key feature of
OpenMolcas is the multiconfigurational approach to the electronic
structure.

dependent_to.name: flux-core
dependent_to.description: A next-generation resource manager (pre-alpha)

dependent_to.name: py-librosa
dependent_to.description: A python package for music and audio analysis.

dependent_to.name: py-tempora
dependent_to.description: Objects and routines pertaining to date and time (tempora)

dependent_to.name: py-slurm-pipeline
dependent_to.description: A Python class for scheduling SLURM jobs

dependent_to.name: py-azure-identity
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Identity Library for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-python-dateutil
dependent_to.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.

dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow
dependent_to.description: TensorFlow is an Open Source Software Library for Machine Intelligence

dependent_to.name: py-torchtext
dependent_to.description: Text utilities and datasets for PyTorch.

dependent_to.name: py-argon2-cffi
dependent_to.description: The secure Argon2 password hashing algorithm..

dependent_to.name: py-ics
dependent_to.description:
Ics.py : iCalendar for Humans Ics.py is a pythonic and easy iCalendar
library. Its goals are to read and write ics data in a developer
friendly way. iCalendar is a widely-used and useful format but not user
friendly. Ics.py is there to give you the ability of creating and
reading this format without any knowledge of it. It should be able to
parse every calendar that respects the rfc5545 and maybe some more. It
also outputs rfc compliant calendars. iCalendar (file extension .ics) is
used by Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, Android and many more. Ics.py
is available for Python>=3.6 and is Apache2 Licensed.

dependent_to.name: py-nc-time-axis
dependent_to.description: cftime support for matplotlib axis.

dependent_to.name: py-nibabel
dependent_to.description: Access a multitude of neuroimaging data formats

dependent_to.name: py-yamlreader
dependent_to.description:
Yamlreader merges YAML data from a directory, a list of files or a file
glob.

dependent_to.name: py-kaggle
dependent_to.description:
Official API for https://www.kaggle.com, accessible using a command line
tool implemented in Python. Beta release - Kaggle reserves the right to
modify the API functionality currently offered.

dependent_to.name: grass
dependent_to.description:
GRASS GIS (Geographic Resources Analysis Support System), is a free and
open source Geographic Information System (GIS) software suite used for
geospatial data management and analysis, image processing, graphics and
maps production, spatial modeling, and visualization.

dependent_to.name: py-pre-commit
dependent_to.description:
A framework for managing and maintaining multi-language pre-commit
hooks.

dependent_to.name: py-automat
dependent_to.description: Self-service finite-state machines for the programmer on the go.

dependent_to.name: py-blessed
dependent_to.description:
Blessed is a thin, practical wrapper around terminal capabilities in
Python.

dependent_to.name: py-pycuda
dependent_to.description:
PyCUDA gives you easy, Pythonic access to Nvidia's CUDA parallel
computation API

dependent_to.name: py-python-utils
dependent_to.description:
Python Utils is a collection of small Python functions and classes which
make common patterns shorter and easier.

dependent_to.name: py-bigfloat
dependent_to.description:
Arbitrary-precision correctly-rounded floating-point arithmetic, via
MPFR.

dependent_to.name: cosmomc
dependent_to.description:
CosmoMC is a Fortran 2008 Markov-Chain Monte-Carlo (MCMC) engine for
exploring cosmological parameter space, together with Fortran and python
code for analysing Monte-Carlo samples and importance sampling (plus a
suite of scripts for building grids of runs, plotting and presenting
results).

dependent_to.name: py-patsy
dependent_to.description:
A Python package for describing statistical models and for building
design matrices.

dependent_to.name: py-python-benedict
dependent_to.description:
A dict subclass with keylist/keypath support, I/O shortcuts and many
utilities.

dependent_to.name: py-virtualenv
dependent_to.description: virtualenv is a tool to create isolated Python environments.

dependent_to.name: py-fs
dependent_to.description: Python's filesystem abstraction layer

dependent_to.name: py-healpy
dependent_to.description: healpy is a Python package to handle pixelated data on the sphere.

dependent_to.name: py-traceback2
dependent_to.description: Backports of the traceback module

dependent_to.name: py-law
dependent_to.description:
Build large-scale task workflows using luigi, remote job submission,
remote targets, and environment

dependent_to.name: py-tenacity
dependent_to.description: Retrying library for Python

dependent_to.name: py-cryptography
dependent_to.description:
cryptography is a package which provides cryptographic recipes and
primitives to Python developers

dependent_to.name: py-gpy
dependent_to.description: The Gaussian Process Toolbox.

dependent_to.name: py-prompt-toolkit
dependent_to.description: Library for building powerful interactive command lines in Python

dependent_to.name: py-google-apitools
dependent_to.description: client libraries for humans

dependent_to.name: py-keystoneauth1
dependent_to.description:
This package contains tools for authenticating to an OpenStack-based
cloud

dependent_to.name: py-tables
dependent_to.description:
PyTables is a package for managing hierarchical datasets and designed to
efficiently and easily cope with extremely large amounts of data.

dependent_to.name: py-testinfra
dependent_to.description:
With Testinfra you can write unit tests in Python to test actual state
of your servers configured by management tools like Salt, Ansible,
Puppet, Chef and so on.

dependent_to.name: py-progressbar2
dependent_to.description: A progress bar for Python 2 and Python 3

dependent_to.name: py-latexcodec
dependent_to.description: A lexer and codec to work with LaTeX code in Python.

dependent_to.name: sollve
dependent_to.description:
The SOLLVE Project aims at scaling OpenMP by leveraging LLVM for
exascale performance and portability of applications. This package
provides a collection of Clang/LLVM compilers and an OpenMP runtime
library.

dependent_to.name: py-wub
dependent_to.description:
Bioinformatics tools and a software library developed by the Oxford
Nanopore Technologies Applications group.

dependent_to.name: py-pathlib2
dependent_to.description: Backport of pathlib from python 3.4

dependent_to.name: py-munch
dependent_to.description:
A Munch is a Python dictionary that provides attribute-style access (a
la JavaScript objects).

dependent_to.name: py-ipdb
dependent_to.description:
ipdb is the iPython debugger and has many additional features, including
a better interactive debugging experience via colorized output.

dependent_to.name: madgraph5amc
dependent_to.description:
MadGraph5_aMC@NLO is a framework that aims at providing all the elements
necessary for SM and BSM phenomenology, such as the computations of
cross sections, the generation of hard events and their matching with
event generators, and the use of a variety of tools relevant to event
manipulation and analysis.

dependent_to.name: py-pynacl
dependent_to.description: Python binding to the Networking and Cryptography (NaCl) library.

dependent_to.name: py-python-jenkins
dependent_to.description: Python bindings for the remote Jenkins API

dependent_to.name: py-hieroglyph
dependent_to.description:
Hieroglyph is an extension for Sphinx which builds HTML presentations
from ReStructured Text documents.

dependent_to.name: py-hdbscan
dependent_to.description:
HDBSCAN - Hierarchical Density-Based Spatial Clustering of Applications
with Noise. Performs DBSCAN over varying epsilon values and integrates
the result to find a clustering that gives the best stability over
epsilon. This allows HDBSCAN to find clusters of varying densities
(unlike DBSCAN), and be more robust to parameter selection. In practice
this means that HDBSCAN returns a good clustering straight away with
little or no parameter tuning -- and the primary parameter, minimum
cluster size, is intuitive and easy to select. HDBSCAN is ideal for
exploratory data analysis; it's a fast and robust algorithm that you can
trust to return meaningful clusters (if there are any).

dependent_to.name: py-gql
dependent_to.description:
This is a GraphQL client for Python. Plays nicely with graphene,
graphql-core, graphql-js and any other GraphQL implementation compatible
with the spec. GQL architecture is inspired by React-Relay and Apollo-
Client.

dependent_to.name: py-monty
dependent_to.description: Monty is the missing complement to Python.

dependent_to.name: py-astroid
dependent_to.description:
A common base representation of python source code for pylint and other
projects.

dependent_to.name: py-sierrapy
dependent_to.description: A Client of HIVdb Sierra GraphQL Webservice

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-arraydiff
dependent_to.description: pytest plugin to help with comparing array output from tests

dependent_to.name: py-flask-restful
dependent_to.description: Simple framework for creating REST APIs

dependent_to.name: py-qtawesome
dependent_to.description: FontAwesome icons in PyQt and PySide applications

dependent_to.name: py-python-socketio
dependent_to.description: Python implementation of the Socket.IO realtime server.

dependent_to.name: py-keras
dependent_to.description:
Deep Learning library for Python. Convnets, recurrent neural networks,
and more. Runs on Theano or TensorFlow.

dependent_to.name: cget
dependent_to.description: Cmake package retrieval.

dependent_to.name: py-llnl-sina
dependent_to.description:
Sina allows codes to store, query, and visualize their data through an
easy-to-use Python API. Data that fits its recognized schema can be
ingested into one or more supported backends. Sina's API is independent
of backend and gives users the benefits of a database without requiring
knowledge of one, allowing queries to be expressed in pure Python.
Visualizations are also provided through Python. Sina is intended
especially for use with run metadata, allowing users to easily and
efficiently find simulation runs that match some criteria.

dependent_to.name: py-h5py
dependent_to.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.

dependent_to.name: py-torchvision
dependent_to.description:
The torchvision package consists of popular datasets, model
architectures, and common image transformations for computer vision.

dependent_to.name: py-pylint
dependent_to.description: python code static checker

dependent_to.name: py-logilab-common
dependent_to.description: Common modules used by Logilab projects

dependent_to.name: py-httpbin
dependent_to.description: HTTP Request and Response Service

dependent_to.name: py-ligo-segments
dependent_to.description: Representations of semi-open intervals.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinxcontrib-napoleon
dependent_to.description: Sphinx "napoleon" extension.

dependent_to.name: py-python-memcached
dependent_to.description:
This software is a 100% Python interface to the memcached memory cache
daemon. It is the client side software which allows storing values in
one or more, possibly remote, memcached servers. Search google for
memcached for more information.

dependent_to.name: py-pygit2
dependent_to.description:
Pygit2 is a set of Python bindings to the libgit2 shared library,
libgit2 implements the core of Git.

dependent_to.name: py-peachpy
dependent_to.description: Portable Efficient Assembly Codegen in Higher-level Python.

dependent_to.name: py-bleach
dependent_to.description: An easy whitelist-based HTML-sanitizing tool.

dependent_to.name: py-cmsml
dependent_to.description: Python package of the CMS Machine Learning Group.

dependent_to.name: py-packaging
dependent_to.description: Core utilities for Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-scikit-image
dependent_to.description:
Image processing algorithms for SciPy, including IO, morphology,
filtering, warping, color manipulation, object detection, etc.

dependent_to.name: py-gsutil
dependent_to.description: A command line tool for interacting with cloud storage services.

dependent_to.name: py-google-api-core
dependent_to.description: Google API client core library.

dependent_to.name: py-tomopy
dependent_to.description:
TomoPy is an open-source Python package for tomographic data processing
and image reconstruction.

dependent_to.name: py-cmake-format
dependent_to.description:
cmake-format project provides Quality Assurance (QA) tools for cmake.
Tools include cmake-annotate, cmake-format, cmake-lint, and ctest-to.

dependent_to.name: py-grpcio
dependent_to.description: HTTP/2-based RPC framework.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-xdist
dependent_to.description: py.test xdist plugin for distributed testing and loop-on-failing mode

dependent_to.name: py-pytools
dependent_to.description: A collection of tools for Python

dependent_to.name: py-python-swiftclient
dependent_to.description: This is a python client for the Swift API.

dependent_to.name: gaudi
dependent_to.description: An experiment-independent HEP event data processing framework

dependent_to.name: py-unittest2
dependent_to.description:
unittest2 is a backport of the new features added to the unittest
testing framework in Python 2.7 and onwards.

dependent_to.name: py-asttokens
dependent_to.description: Annotate AST trees with source code positions.

dependent_to.name: py-protobuf
dependent_to.description:
Protocol buffers are Google's language-neutral, platform-neutral,
extensible mechanism for serializing structured data - think XML, but
smaller, faster, and simpler. You define how you want your data to be
structured once, then you can use special generated source code to
easily write and read your structured data to and from a variety of data
streams and using a variety of languages.

dependent_to.name: py-arcgis
dependent_to.description: ArcGIS API for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-bx-python
dependent_to.description:
The bx-python project is a python library and associated set of scripts
to allow for rapid implementation of genome scale analyses.

dependent_to.name: py-torch
dependent_to.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-cosmos
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Cosmos Client Library for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-google-resumable-media
dependent_to.description: Utilities for Google Media Downloads and Resumable Uploads.

dependent_to.name: py-onnx
dependent_to.description:
Open Neural Network Exchange (ONNX) is an open ecosystem that empowers
AI developers to choose the right tools as their project evolves. ONNX
provides an open source format for AI models, both deep learning and
traditional ML. It defines an extensible computation graph model, as
well as definitions of built-in operators and standard data types.
Currently we focus on the capabilities needed for inferencing (scoring).

dependent_to.name: py-apptools
dependent_to.description:
The apptools project includes a set of packages that Enthought has found
useful in creating a number of applications. They implement
functionality that is commonly needed by many applications.

dependent_to.name: py-rbtools
dependent_to.description:
RBTools is a set of command line tools and a rich Python API for use
with Review Board.

dependent_to.name: py-ecdsa
dependent_to.description: ECDSA cryptographic signature library (pure python)

dependent_to.name: py-paramz
dependent_to.description: The Parameterization Framework.

dependent_to.name: py-google-auth
dependent_to.description:
This library simplifies using Google's various server-to-server
authentication mechanisms to access Google APIs.

dependent_to.name: py-python-gitlab
dependent_to.description: Python wrapper for the GitLab API

dependent_to.name: py-neotime
dependent_to.description: Nanosecond resolution temporal types

dependent_to.name: py-python-engineio
dependent_to.description:
Engine.IO is the implementation of transport-based cross-browser/cross-
device bi-directional communication layer for Socket.IO.

dependent_to.name: py-asdf
dependent_to.description:
The Advanced Scientific Data Format (ASDF) is a next-generation
interchange format for scientific data. This package contains the Python
implementation of the ASDF Standard.

dependent_to.name: py-debtcollector
dependent_to.description:
A collection of Python deprecation patterns and strategies that help
you collect your technical debt in a non-destructive manner.

dependent_to.name: py-knack
dependent_to.description: A Command-Line Interface framework.

dependent_to.name: py-responses
dependent_to.description: A utility library for mocking out the `requests` Python library.

dependent_to.name: py-sfepy
dependent_to.description:
SfePy (https://sfepy.org/) is a software for solving systems of coupled
partial differential equations (PDEs) by the finite element method in
1D, 2D and 3D. It can be viewed both as black-box PDE solver, and as a
Python package which can be used for building custom applications.

dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow-datasets
dependent_to.description:
tensorflow/datasets is a library of datasets ready to use with
TensorFlow.

dependent_to.name: py-more-itertools
dependent_to.description: Additions to the standard Python itertools package.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest
dependent_to.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependent_to.name: py-chalice
dependent_to.description: Python Serverless Microframework for AWS.

dependent_to.name: gnuradio
dependent_to.description:
GNU Radio is a free & open-source software development toolkit that
provides signal processing blocks to implement software radios. It can
be used with readily-available, low-cost external RF hardware to create
software-defined radios, or without hardware in a simulation-like
environment. It is widely used in hobbyist, academic, and commercial
environments to support both wireless communications research and real-
world radio systems.

dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow-probability
dependent_to.description:
TensorFlow Probability (TFP) is a Python library built on TensorFlow
that makes it easy to combine probabilistic models and deep learning on
modern hardware (TPU, GPU). It's for data scientists, statisticians, ML
researchers, and practitioners who want to encode domain knowledge to
understand data and make predictions.

dependent_to.name: py-archspec
dependent_to.description:
A library for detecting, labeling and reasoning about
microarchitectures.

dependent_to.name: py-oauth2client
dependent_to.description:
OAuth 2.0 client library. Note: oauth2client is now deprecated. No more
features will be added to the libraries and the core team is turning
down support. We recommend you use google-auth and oauthlib.

dependent_to.name: py-carputils
dependent_to.description:
The carputils framework for running simulations with the openCARP
software.

dependent_to.name: py-gpustat
dependent_to.description: An utility to monitor NVIDIA GPU status and usage.

dependent_to.name: py-configobj
dependent_to.description: Config file reading, writing and validation.

dependent_to.name: py-pygpu
dependent_to.description: Python packge for the libgpuarray C library.

dependent_to.name: py-nose2
dependent_to.description: unittest2 with plugins, the succesor to nose

dependent_to.name: py-horovod
dependent_to.description:
Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for
TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet.

dependent_to.name: py-traitsui
dependent_to.description:
The TraitsUI project contains a toolkit-independent GUI abstraction
layer, which is used to support the "visualization" features of the
Traits package. Thus, you can write model in terms of the Traits API and
specify a GUI in terms of the primitives supplied by TraitsUI (views,
items, editors, etc.), and let TraitsUI and your selected toolkit and
back-end take care of the details of displaying them.

dependent_to.name: py-maestrowf
dependent_to.description:
A general purpose workflow conductor for running multi-step simulation
studies.

dependent_to.name: py-imgaug
dependent_to.description:
A library for image augmentation in machine learning experiments,
particularly convolutional neural networks. Supports the augmentation of
images, keypoints/landmarks, bounding boxes, heatmaps and segmentation
maps in a variety of different ways.

dependent_to.name: py-cfgv
dependent_to.description: Validate configuration and produce human readable error messages.

dependent_to.name: py-jsonpath-ng
dependent_to.description:
A final implementation of JSONPath for Python that aims to be standard
compliant, including arithmetic and binary comparison operators.

dependent_to.name: py-promise
dependent_to.description:
This is a implementation of Promises in Python. It is a super set of
Promises/A+ designed to have readable, performant code and to provide
just the extensions that are absolutely necessary for using promises in
Python.

dependent_to.name: py-fiona
dependent_to.description: Fiona reads and writes spatial data files.

dependent_to.name: py-theano
dependent_to.description:
Optimizing compiler for evaluating mathematical expressions on CPUs and
GPUs.

dependent_to.name: py-resampy
dependent_to.description: Efficient sample rate conversion in python

dependent_to.name: py-astunparse
dependent_to.description:
An AST unparser for Python. This is a factored out version of unparse
found in the Python source distribution; under Demo/parser in Python 2
and under Tools/parser in Python 3.

dependent_to.name: py-sacremoses
dependent_to.description: LGPL MosesTokenizer in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-httpbin
dependent_to.description: Easily test your HTTP library against a local copy of httpbin

dependent_to.name: py-pyutilib
dependent_to.description:
The PyUtilib project supports a collection of Python utilities,
including a well-developed component architecture and extensions to the
PyUnit testing framework. PyUtilib has been developed to support several
Python-centric projects, especially Pyomo. PyUtilib is available under
the BSD License.

dependent_to.name: py-pybedtools
dependent_to.description: Python wrapper -- and more -- for Aaron Quinlan's BEDTools

dependent_to.name: py-mdanalysis
dependent_to.description:
MDAnalysis is a Python toolkit to analyze molecular dynamics
trajectories generated by a wide range of popular simulation packages
including DL_Poly, CHARMM, Amber, NAMD, LAMMPS, and Gromacs. (See the
lists of supported trajectory formats and topology formats.)

dependent_to.name: gtk-doc
dependent_to.description:
GtkDoc is a tool used to extract API documentation from C-code like
Doxygen, but handles documentation of GObject (including signals and
properties) that makes it very suitable for GTK+ apps and libraries. It
uses docbook for intermediate files and can produce html by default and
pdf/man-pages with some extra work.

dependent_to.name: py-anytree
dependent_to.description:
Python tree data library - lightweight and extensible Tree data
structure.

dependent_to.name: py-tensorboard
dependent_to.description:
TensorBoard is a suite of web applications for inspecting and
understanding your TensorFlow runs and graphs.

dependent_to.name: py-python-keystoneclient
dependent_to.description:
This is a client for the OpenStack Identity API, implemented by the
Keystone team

dependent_to.name: py-gffutils
dependent_to.description:
GFF and GTF file manipulation and interconversion gffutils is a Python
package for working with and manipulating the GFF and GTF format files
typically used for genomic annotations. Files are loaded into a sqlite3
database, allowing much more complex manipulation of hierarchical
features (e.g., genes, transcripts, and exons) than is possible with
plain-text methods alone.

dependent_to.name: py-matplotlib
dependent_to.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-python-xlib
dependent_to.description:
The Python X Library is intended to be a fully functional X client
library for Python programs. It is written entirely in Python, in
contrast to earlier X libraries for Python (the ancient X extension and
the newer plxlib) which were interfaces to the C Xlib.

dependent_to.name: py-h5sh
dependent_to.description: Shell-like environment for HDF5.

dependent_to.name: py-pyrsistent
dependent_to.description:
Pyrsistent is a number of persistent collections (by some referred to as
functional data structures). Persistent in the sense that they are
immutable.

dependent_to.name: py-sqlalchemy-utils
dependent_to.description: Various utility functions and custom data types for SQLAlchemy.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinxcontrib-bibtex
dependent_to.description: A Sphinx extension for BibTeX style citations.

dependent_to.name: py-agate
dependent_to.description:
agate is a Python data analysis library that is optimized for humans
instead of machines. It is an alternative to numpy and pandas that
solves real-world problems with readable code.

dependent_to.name: py-fasteners
dependent_to.description: A python package that provides useful locks.

dependent_to.name: py-flatten-dict
dependent_to.description:
A flexible utility for flattening and unflattening dict-lik objects in
Python

dependent_to.name: py-azure-cli-core
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Command-Line Tools Core Module.

dependent_to.name: py-plotly
dependent_to.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python

dependent_to.name: py-pyarrow
dependent_to.description:
A cross-language development platform for in-memory data. This package
contains the Python bindings.

dependent_to.name: py-lmfit
dependent_to.description: Least-Squares Minimization with Bounds and Constraints

dependent_to.name: py-tensorboardx
dependent_to.description:
The purpose of this package is to let researchers use a simple interface
to log events within PyTorch (and then show visualization in
tensorboard). This package currently supports logging scalar, image,
audio, histogram, text, embedding, and the route of back-propagation.

dependent_to.name: py-coilmq
dependent_to.description: Lightweight Python STOMP message broker.

dependent_to.name: py-pyjnius
dependent_to.description: Pyjnius is a Python library for accessing Java classes.

dependent_to.name: py-hpccm
dependent_to.description:
HPC Container Maker (HPCCM - pronounced H-P-see-M) is an open source
tool to make it easier to generate container specification files.

dependent_to.name: py-readme-renderer
dependent_to.description:
readme_renderer is a library for rendering "readme" descriptions for
Warehouse.

dependent_to.name: py-bandit
dependent_to.description: Security oriented static analyser for python code.

dependent_to.name: py-kubernetes
dependent_to.description: Official Python client library for kubernetes.

dependent_to.name: py-mock
dependent_to.description:
mock is a library for testing in Python. It allows you to replace parts
of your system under test with mock objects and make assertions about
how they have been used.

dependent_to.name: py-pyperf
dependent_to.description:
The Python perf module is a toolkit to write, run and analyze
benchmarks.

dependent_to.name: py-traitlets
dependent_to.description: Traitlets Python config system

dependent_to.name: py-html5lib
dependent_to.description: HTML parser based on the WHATWG HTML specification.

dependent_to.name: py-wxpython
dependent_to.description: Cross platform GUI toolkit for Python.

dependent_to.name: thrift
dependent_to.description:
Software framework for scalable cross-language services development.
Thrift combines a software stack with a code generation engine to build
services that work efficiently and seamlessly between C++, Java, Python,
PHP, Ruby, Erlang, Perl, Haskell, C#, Cocoa, JavaScript, Node.js,
Smalltalk, OCaml and Delphi and other languages.

dependent_to.name: py-parsimonious
dependent_to.description: (Soon to be) the fastest pure-Python PEG parser

dependent_to.name: py-bokeh
dependent_to.description: Statistical and novel interactive HTML plots for Python

dependent_to.name: py-wandb
dependent_to.description: A tool for visualizing and tracking your machine learning experiments.

dependent_to.name: py-ppft
dependent_to.description: Distributed and parallel python

dependent_to.name: py-dockerpy-creds
dependent_to.description: Python bindings for the docker credentials store API

dependent_to.name: py-pydap
dependent_to.description: An implementation of the Data Access Protocol.

dependent_to.name: py-flask-cors
dependent_to.description:
A Flask extension for handling Cross Origin Resource Sharing (CORS),
making cross-origin AJAX possible.

dependent_to.name: py-cf-units
dependent_to.description:
Units of measure as required by the Climate and Forecast (CF) metadata
conventions.

dependent_to.name: py-keras-preprocessing
dependent_to.description: Utilities for working with image data, text data, and sequence data.

dependent_to.name: py-distributed
dependent_to.description: Distributed scheduler for Dask

dependent_to.name: py-pyopenssl
dependent_to.description:
High-level wrapper around a subset of the OpenSSL library. Note: The
Python Cryptographic Authority strongly suggests the use of
pyca/cryptography where possible. If you are using pyOpenSSL for
anything other than making a TLS connection you should move to
cryptography and drop your pyOpenSSL dependency.

dependent_to.name: py-hep-ml
dependent_to.description: Machine Learning for High Energy Physics

dependent_to.name: py-hdfs
dependent_to.description: API and command line interface for HDFS

dependent_to.name: py-pybtex
dependent_to.description: Pybtex is a BibTeX-compatible bibliography processor written in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-azure-core
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Core Library for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-singledispatch
dependent_to.description: This library brings functools.singledispatch to Python 2.6-3.3.

dependent_to.name: py-earthengine-api
dependent_to.description:
This package allows developers to interact with Google Earth Engine
using the Python programming language.

dependent_to.name: py-bcbio-gff
dependent_to.description: Read and write Generic Feature Format (GFF) with Biopython integration.

dependent_to.name: py-hpcbench
dependent_to.description: Define and run your benchmarks

dependent_to.name: py-visdom
dependent_to.description:
Visdom aims to facilitate visualization of (remote) data with an
emphasis on supporting scientific experimentation.

dependent_to.name: py-pymatgen
dependent_to.description:
Python Materials Genomics is a robust materials analysis code that
defines core object representations for structures and molecules with
support for many electronic structure codes. It is currently the core
analysis code powering the Materials Project.

dependent_to.name: py-envisage
dependent_to.description:
Envisage is a Python-based framework for building extensible
applications, that is, applications whose functionality can be extended
by adding "plug-ins". Envisage provides a standard mechanism for
features to be added to an application, whether by the original
developer or by someone else. In fact, when you build an application
using Envisage, the entire application consists primarily of plug-ins.
In this respect, it is similar to the Eclipse and Netbeans frameworks
for Java applications.

dependent_to.name: py-cycler
dependent_to.description: Composable style cycles.

dependent_to.name: py-ml-collections
dependent_to.description:
ML Collections is a library of Python collections designed for ML
usecases.

dependent_to.name: py-pythran
dependent_to.description: Ahead of Time compiler for numeric kernels.

dependent_to.name: py-pycbc
dependent_to.description:
PyCBC is a software package used to explore astrophysical sources of
gravitational waves. It contains algorithms to analyze gravitational-
wave data from the LIGO and Virgo detectors, detect coalescing compact
binaries, and measure the astrophysical parameters of detected sources.
PyCBC was used in the first direct detection of gravitational waves and
is used in the flagship analysis of LIGO and Virgo data.

dependent_to.name: py-leather
dependent_to.description:
Leather is the Python charting library for those who need charts now and
don't care if they're perfect.

dependent_to.name: py-pockets
dependent_to.description: A collection of helpful Python tools.

dependent_to.name: py-lscsoft-glue
dependent_to.description:
Glue (Grid LSC User Environment) is a suite of python modules and
programs to allow users to run LSC codes on the grid. It also provides
certain metadata services, such as the LSC segment database.

dependent_to.name: py-pybtex-docutils
dependent_to.description: A docutils backend for pybtex.

dependent_to.name: py-stevedore
dependent_to.description: Manage Dynamic Plugins for Python Applications.

dependent_to.name: py-chainer
dependent_to.description:
Chainer is a Python-based deep learning framework aiming at
flexibility. It provides automatic differentiation APIs based on the
define-by-run approach (a.k.a. dynamic computational graphs) as well as
object-oriented high-level APIs to build and train neural networks. It
also supports CUDA/cuDNN using CuPy for high performance training and
inference.

dependent_to.name: py-ipython-cluster-helper
dependent_to.description:
Quickly and easily parallelize Python functions using IPython on a
cluster, supporting multiple schedulers. Optimizes IPython defaults to
handle larger clusters and simultaneous processes.

dependent_to.name: py-hepdata-lib
dependent_to.description: Library for getting your data into HEPData

dependent_to.name: py-fparser
dependent_to.description: Parser for Fortran 77..2003 code.

dependent_to.name: py-rdflib
dependent_to.description:
RDFLib is a pure Python package for working with RDF. RDFLib contains
most things you need to work with RDF, including: parsers and
serializers for RDF/XML, N3, NTriples, N-Quads, Turtle, TriX, Trig and
JSON-LD (via a plugin). a Graph interface which can be backed by any one
of a number of Store implementations store implementations for in-memory
storage and persistent storage on top of the Berkeley DB a SPARQL 1.1
implementation - supporting SPARQL 1.1 Queries and Update statements

dependent_to.name: py-google-api-python-client
dependent_to.description:
The Google API Client for Python is a client library for accessing the
Plus, Moderator, and many other Google APIs.

dependent_to.name: py-absl-py
dependent_to.description:
This repository is a collection of Python library code for building
Python applications. The code is collected from Google's own Python code
base, and has been extensively tested and used in production.

dependent_to.name: py-multipledispatch
dependent_to.description: A relatively sane approach to multiple dispatch in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-isodate
dependent_to.description:
This module implements ISO 8601 date, time and duration parsing. The
implementation follows ISO8601:2004 standard, and implements only
date/time representations mentioned in the standard. If something is not
mentioned there, then it is treated as non existent, and not as an
allowed option.

dependent_to.name: py-pythonsollya
dependent_to.description: Python wrapper for the Sollya library

dependent_to.name: py-tox
dependent_to.description: tox is a generic virtualenv management and test command line tool.

dependent_to.name: py-gensim
dependent_to.description:
Gensim is a Python library for topic modelling, document indexing and
similarity retrieval with large corpora. Target audience is the natural
language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR) community.

dependent_to.name: py-pyomo
dependent_to.description:
Pyomo is a Python-based open-source software package that supports a
diverse set of optimization capabilities for formulating and analyzing
optimization models.

dependent_to.name: py-websocket-client
dependent_to.description: WebSocket client for Python. hybi13 is supported.

dependent_to.name: py-hvac
dependent_to.description: HashiCorp Vault API client

dependent_to.name: py-selectors34
dependent_to.description: Backport of the selectors module from Python 3.4.

dependent_to.name: py-warlock
dependent_to.description: Self-validating Python objects using JSON schema

dependent_to.name: nrm
dependent_to.description: Node Resource Manager

dependent_to.name: llvm
dependent_to.description:
The LLVM Project is a collection of modular and reusable compiler and
toolchain technologies. Despite its name, LLVM has little to do with
traditional virtual machines, though it does provide helpful libraries
that can be used to build them. The name "LLVM" itself is not an
acronym; it is the full name of the project.

dependent_to.name: py-fenics-instant
dependent_to.description:
Instant is a Python module that allows for instant inlining of C and C++
code in Python. It is a small Python module built on top of SWIG and
Distutils. Instant has been retired after 2017.2.0 release. It is no
longer needed in FEniCS and hence no longer maintained and tested.

dependent_to.name: py-junit-xml
dependent_to.description:
Creates JUnit XML test result documents that can be read by tools such
as Jenkins

dependent_to.name: py-csvkit
dependent_to.description:
A library of utilities for working with CSV, the king of tabular file
formats

dependent_to.name: py-rpy2
dependent_to.description:
rpy2 is a redesign and rewrite of rpy. It is providing a low-level
interface to R from Python, a proposed high-level interface, including
wrappers to graphical libraries, as well as R-like structures and
functions.
